title: SOULM8TE
writer: Ingrid Bisu, Kate Dolan, Rafael Jordan
actors: Claudia Doumit, David Rysdahl, Lily Sullivan
plot: A man acquires an Artificially Intelligent android to cope with the loss of his recently deceased wife. In an attempt to create a truly sentient partner, he inadvertently turns a harmless lovebot into a deadly soulmate.
